title: Astro Bot is The Best Reviewed Game of The Year - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.05.24
description:
Head over to Kindafunny.com/DragonAge to listen and subscribe to Dragon Age: Vows & Vengeance!

This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

Astro Bot is the best reviewed game of 2024 so far, Black Myth Wukong is getting an expansion, and something big is coming to Helldivers 2.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
GAMESCAST - is our Astro Bot review
The STREAM is Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2 w/ Mike, Roger, and Bless
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
You can get today’s Gregway
And you can get Screencast this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Delaney Twining & Karl Jacobs
